name: Trial of Strength
originalText:
When Trial of Strength enters the battlefield, create a 4/2 green Beast creature token.
When a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control, return Trial of Strength to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: Each Trial has an ability to return to your hand when a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control. The Trial is returned to its owner’s hand only if it’s on the battlefield as the ability resolves.
